name: Vatic Gaze
description: You can detect magic at will and use Sense Motive to determine opponent's highest level spell.

name: Spell Penetration
description: +2 bonus on caster level checks to defeat spell resistance.

name: Spell Focus (Conjuration)
description: +1 bonus on save DCs against specified school of magic.

name: Greater Spell Penetration
description: +4 bonus on caster level checks to defeat spell resistance.

name: Greater Spell Focus (Conjuration)
description: +2 bonus on save DCs against specified school of magic.

name: Imbued Summoning
description: Imbue summoned creatures with spell effects of 3rd level or lower.
